title: Crystal Serpent
summaries: The Crystal Serpent is a Hardmode magic weapon that fires a magical pink charge that shatters into 3-5 smaller sparks upon impact with an enemy or solid block, each of which deals 80% base damage and knockback (32 base damage and a knockback of 3.52 (Weak)). These sparks are affected by gravity and ricochet against solid blocks, lasting one second before disappearing. When fired at a one-block-thick wall, one of the splash projectiles has a chance of passing through to the other side. The Crystal Serpent can be rarely obtained by fishing in the Hallow biome in any layer.
It is the Hallowed counterpart to the <linked>Corruption</linked>'s <linked>Toxikarp</linked> and the <linked>Crimson</linked>'s <linked>Bladetongue</linked>.
